parameters.name: BackupId
parameters.description: The ID of the backup file. You can call the [DescribeBackups](~~473823~~) operation to query the IDs of backup files.

parameters.name: ExpectExpireTime
parameters.description: The point in time to which you want to extend the expiration time. Specify the time in the yyyy-MM-ddTHH:mmZ format. The time must be in UTC. The time cannot be earlier than the current expiration time.
